verses.text: Sometime \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w Festival|strong="G1859"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w near|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* sheep-gate, \w a|strong="G2192"\w* bath \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* colonnades \w around|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w*. \w It|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* ‘Bethesda.’

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* colonnades \w a|strong="G1722"\w* large \w number|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w sick|strong="G2621"\w* \w people|strong="G4128"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w lying|strong="G2621"\w* – \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w lame|strong="G5560"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* crippled.

\f + \fr 5.4 \ft Some later manuscripts add: for an angel of the Lord went down at certain times into the pool, and stirred up the water. The first person to step in after the stirring of the water was healed of whatever disease they had.\f*

\w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* crippled \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w thirty-eight|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

“\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w*, \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*,” \w the|strong="G1722"\w* sick \w man|strong="G3739"\w* answered, “\w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w put|strong="G1519"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* bath \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* troubling \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w*, \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* getting \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w*, \w someone|strong="G3739"\w* \w else|strong="G1161"\w* \w steps|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.”

\wj “\+w Stand|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w*,”\wj* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj “\+w take|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w mat|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w*.”\wj*

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G4160"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* away, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* authorities \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* cured \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.
